choose_shape.name: choose_shape
choose_shape.code:
import psutil
import pyautogui

def choose_shape(data):
    print("Choose shape")
    try:
        num = int(data['shape_num'])
        data['xy'] = data['shapes'][num]
        pyautogui.moveTo(*data['xy'])
        del data['shape_num']
        try:
            pid = data['img_pid']
            p = psutil.Process(pid)
            p.kill()
            del data['img_pid']
        except KeyError:
            pass
    except Exception as e:
        data['error'] = str(e)
    return data

choose_shape(data)
